links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
mathematica: Do[ If[ !PrimeQ[ n ], If[ Mod[ DivisorSigma[ 1, n ], n-EulerPhi[ n ] ] == 0, Print[ n ] ], {n, 1, 500} ]Select[Range[500],CompositeQ[#]&&Divisible[DivisorSigma[1,#],#-EulerPhi[ #]]&] (* _Harvey P. Dale_, May 16 2016 *)
